description:
Installs the project bowerDependencies or a specific set of endpoints.
Endpoints can have multiple forms:
- <source>
- <source>#<target>
- <name>=<source>#<target>

Where:
- <source> is a package URL, physical location or registry name
- <target> is a valid range, commit, branch, etc.
- <name> is the name it should have locally.

options.description: Save installed packages into the project's package.json bowerDependencies
Save installed packages into the project's package.json devbowerDependencies
